name: Calon Arang, Balinese Folklore
description:
This artwork were inspired by Balinese folklore, titled Calon Arang.
Or shall we say it is one of Indonesia dark folklore pride. 

Calon Arang is a story about woman who turn herself into a demon then destroying a whole village she hated.
At least that's the common people know about it. 

But when i dig deeper into the Folklore and doing some hystorical research, i'm so excited to know that i found so many symbols contained from the story itself which is belong to the traces of the oldest root of emancipations idea, yet a huge intriguing dillematic side of being woman who live in those age neither when they being a woman like their social status 'used to do' nor while a woman being a rebelious one which is being judges as a 'demon' by the society later. 

And in this art pieces, i took a part to depicting how a woman still can be called as a warm dillematic heart even know they turn theirself into their 'demon' side which is caused by their social status that makes them never treated as an equal right as they deserved to be, just like what we called it with emancipation terms today. 

A classic issue that still never took a serious places in our society, in an ages that need to be retold.
